text: Charles Jeremy Lewis (October 21, 1934 - July 15, 2021) was an American politician. He was a U.S. Representative, last serving . He is a former chairman of the House Appropriations Committee, serving in that role during the 109th Congress. In January 2012 he announced that he was not running for re-election and would end his congressional career in January 2013. Lewis died on July 15, 2021 in Redlands, California at the age of 86.Long-Serving California Republican Rep. title: Jerry Lewis (California politician)
